infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_smallshelf: Basic wall-mounted storage solution. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_mediumshelf: Basic wall-mounted storage solution. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_shellrack: A metal frame designed to hold railgun shells. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_shellrack_hu: A wall-mounted magazine designed to hold many railgun shells. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_craterack: A shelf for neatly storing cargo crates. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_craterack_ta: A taller shelf for neatly storing cargo crates. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_craterack_fr: An enclosed crate shelf with controls for temperature or humidity sensitive cargo. Requires electricity. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_chemlightbox: Box of chemlights; a disposable single-use light source. Red in color.
Box of chemlights; a disposable single-use light source. Green in color.
Box of chemlights; a disposable single-use light source. Blue in color.
Box of chemlights; a disposable single-use light source. Amber in color.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_cart_depthch: A sturdy metal cart for transporting items like metal crates, depth charge shells, and diving suits.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_handtruck: A simple hand truck for moving heavy railgun shells with ease.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_handtruck_re: A hand truck with shielded pig for moving fuel rods outside the reactor.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_artifactbox: A large heavily-insulated container designed to hold artifacts for transportation and study.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_storagecrate: A rugged watertight container for storage and transportation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_crateblocker: An empty storage spacer. Can be used to prevent placing cargo in unused crate slots.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_materiallock: A heavy storage locker for organization. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_mulecargo: A battery-powered large underwater propulsion sled capable of carrying 4 cargo crates, with an additional slot for small to medium-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_securelocker: Lockable storage for small- and medium-sized items. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
Lockable storage for small- and medium-sized items. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
Lockable storage for small- and medium-sized items. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
Lockable storage for small- and medium-sized items. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
Lockable storage for small- and medium-sized items. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_text: A blank label card with room for written information.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_sonarb: A label card with a picture of a sonar beacon sonar on it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_mining: A label card with a picture of an electric drill on it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_metalf: A label card with a picture of a metallic foam canister on it.
A label card with a picture of a metallic foam sprayer on it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_pulsec: A label card with a picture of an ion pulse cutter on it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_laserd: A label card with a picture of a laser bore on it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_label_arcwel: A label card with a picture of an arc welder on it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_labelprinter: A quartermaster's best friend. This handheld device can scan and print sorting labels for most common cargo items.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_reinforcedta: High-pressure composite tank, resistant to puncture and heat.
High-pressure composite tank, resistant to puncture and heat.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_rebreatherun: Experimental self-contained rebreather unit, its connections are designed to be compatible with most standard coalition diving equipment. Requires batteries and internal oxygen storage to function.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_jetscooter: Advanced underwater propulsion device. Features improved battery lifetime and a built-in sonar navigation system.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_advancedsona: A handheld positional beacon transmitter, an invaluable tool for extravehicular operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_Utility_hard: A rugged pressure suit designed for shipyard construction, mining, and salvage operations. The suit provides moderate insulation from electrical and thermal hazards, while manipulator gloves allow the wearer to operate tools and equiptment as normal. \n[ Rated 6200m ]
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_utility_hard: A rugged pressure suit designed for shipyard construction, mining, and salvage operations. The suit provides moderate insulation from electrical and thermal hazards, while manipulator gloves allow the wearer to operate tools and equiptment as normal. \n[ Rated 6200m ]
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_oxygencell1: Hardsuit non-rechargable oxygen supply which utilizes chemical reagents to produce a large density of oxygen.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_oxygencell2: Hardsuit non-rechargable oxygen supply which utilizes chemical reagents to produce a large density of oxygen.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_utility_hard: A rugged pressure suit designed for shipyard construction, mining, and salvage operations. The suit provides moderate insulation from electrical and thermal hazards, while manipulator gloves allow the wearer to operate tools and equiptment as normal. \n[ Rated 6200m ]

infotexts.entitydescription.ekR_densifiedmaterial_: A bulk storage/transportation container of nitroglycerin.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_divingsuitlo: Storage for one diving suit, refills oxygen if powered. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_oxygentanksh: Storage for three oxygen tanks, refills oxygen if powered. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_portablespri: A general-purpose sprinkler system for agricultural use or light fire suppression. Requires electricity. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeablejun: A simple wall mounted electrical junction. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_heavypowersw: An industrial-strength power disconnect, capable of handling a single-pin throughput of up to 6000kw. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeablebat: Wall mounted heavy battery power stack. 2000kw capacity, 1500kw discharge rate. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeablefab: A machine capable of manufacturing a wide range of items out of basic raw materials. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
An improved fabricator unit with adaptive control computer and improved manufacturing tolerances. Lower calibration skill requirements. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeablemed: A machine that can be used to manufacture various medicines. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeabledec: Disassembles and breaks down items to reusable components and material bars. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeableson: Usable device for observing the sub's sonar. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_placeablesta: Usable device for viewing a schematic of the sub as well as the status of each room. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_chargingdock: A wall-mounted battery cell charging dock. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_reinforcedta: High-pressure composite tank, resistant to puncture and heat.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_heavytank_in: High-pressure composite tank, resistant to puncture and heat.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_miningdrill: Industral strength handheld drill. Used for mining and salvage operations.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_metalfoam_ta: Contains an advanced metal-catalyst dissolution used to rapidly repair hull damage, for use in the Metallic Foam Sprayer. \nDanger: Highly toxic, Do not open.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_metalfoam_gu: Advanced hull sealing technology. Utilizes a special chemical-metalloid formula extruded through a heated nozzle to rapidly repair fractured or punctured hull sections.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_ioncutter: Heavy cutting tool which utilizes rapid pulses of accelerated charged particles. Effective against a range of materials but suffers from poor power efficiency. Danger: Obstructing the ion beam while active may cause disability or serious injury such as - third degree burns, limb loss, vaporization, and death.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_redchemlight: Temporary handheld light. Useful for marking a path while exploring outside the sub. \nPS: You need to press the use key to activate (default is E).
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_greenchemlig: Temporary handheld light. Useful for marking a path while exploring outside the sub. \nPS: You need to press the use key to activate (default is E).
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_bluechemligh: Temporary handheld light. Useful for marking a path while exploring outside the sub. \nPS: You need to press the use key to activate (default is E).
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_yellowchemli: Temporary handheld light. Useful for marking a path while exploring outside the sub. \nPS: You need to press the use key to activate (default is E).
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_medicalscann: A handheld scanner that displays the health status of individuals.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_grapplegun: An effective displacement method, yet due to poor design, it's only functional underwater. (Press the 'ragdoll' button to drag oneself)
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_jetpack1: A novel device once used by explorers of the surface and even worlds beyond. Runs using the same fuel composition as a standard welding tank.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_longrangerad: A waterproof high-power radio transmitter pack designed for use by coalition expedition crew, which, after buoyancy adjustments, can float in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_electroflare: A small self-contained lighting unit. Can be recharged at a charging dock.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_pda: Handheld computer which displays local structural and atmospheric information from the onboard diagnostics network.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_pdacargo: Handheld computer which displays ship logistics and cargo information from the onboard diagnostics network.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_hullrepairki: A low-tech solution for temporary hull repairs. Consumes steel bars to repair structural damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_laserdrill: Phase-multiplied portable laser unit designed for cutting away ice and rock. Overheats easily due to its compact design.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_miningbackpa: A sturdy backpack with external frame, often used by mining outpost crews.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_medicalbackp: A simple medical bag designed to be worn as a backpack.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_arcwelder: Electrically powered welding tool which utilizes a heavy electrode to create arcs of plasma.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_incendiumfue: A bar of enriched incendium, for use within a reactor. Generates significantly more heat and lasts longer than uranium fuel rods.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekutility_supplypouch: A pouch for holding various small items such as tools or medicines.
infotexts.entitydescription.EKR_utility_customwire: Industrial piping used to run wire connections around the vessel.
infotexts.entitydescription.EKR_Dischargecoil: A small, self-installable Electrical Discharge Coil that consumes only half the power of a standard Electrical Discharge Coil but has a longer cooldown time after use. ( Place by pressing aim + use )
infotexts.afflictiondescription.EKR_PrecisionOpera: Your operations are more precise, and the speed of dismantling items, repairing equipment, and restoring the structure is significantly faster.
